title: Small Steps, Big Results
itunes:summary:
It's easy to think that your marriage needs a big breakthrough when you want to reconnect with each other. But, that's not always the case. John, Greg and Erin discuss the importance of how small actions can go a long way in your relationship. Featuring Matt and Lisa Jacobson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the "100 Ways to Love" bundle with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-07-01?refcd=1111304

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/small-steps-big-results/

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
